<title level="1" right="Cantrip 3" pfs="Standard">[Song of Marching](/Spells.aspx?ID=731)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Bard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=19" />
<trait label="Cantrip" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=22" />
<trait label="Composition" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=31" />
<trait label="Enchantment" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=61" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 228 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Single Action" /></row>
<row>[verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Area** 60-foot emanation

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** sustained up to 1 hour
</row>

</column>

---

You maintain a brisk performance that keeps allies on the move. You and your allies in the area can [Hustle](/Actions.aspx?ID=515) for the spell's duration, even though you are also Sustaining the Spell. You and your allies then become temporarily immune for 1 day.

---
**Heightened (6th)** You can Sustain the Spell for up to 2 hours.

**Heightened (9th)** You can Sustain the Spell for up to 4 hours.
